sys_ux_client_script.name: Execute validation flow

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_d11a68741bbb3010a047ca641a4bcb84

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Knowledge View">43ed8c3c1b3b3010a047ca641a4bcb16</macroponent><name>Execute validation flow</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    
    (function() {
	
	var inputs = {};

	inputs['suite_to_run'] = api.data.get_test_suite_1; // String 

	GlideFlow.startSubflow('x_snc_simulator_sa.execute_test_suite', inputs)
		.then(function(execution) {
			return execution.awaitCompletion();
		}, errorResolver)
		.then(function(completion) {

			var status = completion.status;

		});

	function errorResolver(error) {
		// Handle errors in error resolver
	}
})();



}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-10 20:26:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>d11a68741bbb3010a047ca641a4bcb84</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Execute validation flow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Simulator Sandbox" source="x_snc_simulator_sa">18ab325c1bf73010b81fdce7cc4bcb9c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Simulator Sandbox">18ab325c1bf73010b81fdce7cc4bcb9c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_d11a68741bbb3010a047ca641a4bcb84</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-10 21:10:36</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
